author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How did a typical MythBusters shoot break down? Why didn't Adam Savage use cardboard to protect himself against Jamie's paintball shots during the Quick on the Draw myth? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Wasteland Reaper and leatherelf2078, whom we thank for their support! Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join

Myths Viewers Say Adam Got Wrong (and His Response): https://youtu.be/ySpQbBz0FqQ
A Myth About MythBusters BUSTED: https://youtu.be/FPOh8RCUwL4

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Why the MythBusters Hosts HATED "Blueprint Days"
